languages.text: "Бедняга... Даже сквозь века я чувствую поглотившее его отчаяние..."

traits.locale_text: "Бедняга... Даже сквозь века я чувствую поглотившее его отчаяние..."

languages.text: "This poor man... Even through the centuries, I can still feel the despair that consumed him..."
languages.original_text: "Бедняга... Даже сквозь века я чувствую поглотившее его отчаяние..."

languages.text: “可怜的人……即便是几个世纪之后，我依然能感受到当时吞噬他的绝望……”
languages.original_text: "This poor man... Even through the centuries, I can still feel the despair that consumed him..."

traits.locale_text: “可怜的人……即便是几个世纪之后，我依然能感受到当时吞噬他的绝望……”

languages.text: «Pobre hombre... Incluso a través de los siglos puedo sentir la desesperación que le consumía...».
languages.original_text: "This poor man... Even through the centuries, I can still feel the despair that consumed him..."

traits.locale_text: «Pobre hombre... Incluso a través de los siglos puedo sentir la desesperación que le consumía...».

languages.text: 「なんと哀れな…何世紀もたった今でも、彼を飲み込んだ絶望が感じられます…」
languages.original_text: "This poor man... Even through the centuries, I can still feel the despair that consumed him..."

traits.locale_text: 「なんと哀れな…何世紀もたった今でも、彼を飲み込んだ絶望が感じられます…」

languages.text: "Der arme Mann ... Selbst nach Jahrhunderten spüre ich noch die Verzweiflung, die ihn verzehrt hat ..."
languages.original_text: "This poor man... Even through the centuries, I can still feel the despair that consumed him..."

traits.locale_text: "Der arme Mann ... Selbst nach Jahrhunderten spüre ich noch die Verzweiflung, die ihn verzehrt hat ..."

languages.text: « Le malheureux... Même à travers les siècles, je peux encore sentir le désespoir qui l'a emporté... »
languages.original_text: "This poor man... Even through the centuries, I can still feel the despair that consumed him..."

languages.text: "Zavallı adam... Yüzyıllar geçse de onu tüketen çaresizliği hâlâ hissedebiliyorum..."
languages.original_text: "This poor man... Even through the centuries, I can still feel the despair that consumed him..."
